snippet: Jose Mourinho explained how happy he was with his Manchester United project on Friday, acknowledging that it was "easy to feel at home" with one of the world's biggest clubs....
lead_paragraph: Jose Mourinho explained how happy he was with his Manchester United project on Friday, acknowledging that it was "easy to feel at home" with one of the world's biggest clubs.

headline.main: United Beginning to Feel Like Home for Happy Mourinho
headline.print_headline: United Beginning to Feel Like Home for Happy Mourinho
